tool.name: SBOL Converter
tool.description: Convert between SBOL3 and other genetic design formats
tool.command: #if str($convert_type.type) == "SBOL2 to SBOL3" ln -sv '$sbol2_input' 'input.$sbol2_input.ext' && sbol2-to-sbol3 -o '$output' 'input.$sbol2_input.ext' #elif str($convert_type.type) == "SBOL3 to SBOL2" ln -sv '$sbol3_input' 'input.$sbol3_input.ext' && sbol3-to-sbol2 -o '$output' 'input.$sbol3_input.ext' #elif str($convert_type.type) == "SBOL3 to GENBANK" ln -sv '$sbol3_input' 'input.$sbol3_input.ext' && sbol-to-genbank -o '$output' 'input.$sbol3_input.ext' #elif str($convert_type.type) == "GENBANK to SBOL3" ln -sv '$genbank_input' 'input.$genbank_input.ext' && genbank-to-sbol -o '$output' 'input.$genbank_input.ext' --namespace '$convert_type.namespace' #elif str($convert_type.type) == "SBOL3 to FASTA" ln -sv '$sbol3_input' 'input.$sbol3_input.ext' && sbol-to-fasta -o '$output' 'input.$sbol3_input.ext' #elif str($convert_type.type) == "FASTA to SBOL3" ln -sv '$fasta_input' 'input.$fasta_input.ext' && fasta-to-sbol -o '$output' 'input.$fasta_input.ext' --namespace '$convert_type.namespace' #elif str($convert_type.type) == "SBOL2 to FASTA" ln -sv '$sbol2_input' 'input.$sbol2_input.ext' && sbol-converter SBOL2 FASTA -o '$output' 'input.$sbol2_input.ext' #elif str($convert_type.type) == "FASTA to SBOL2" ln -sv '$fasta_input' 'input.$fasta_input.ext' && sbol-converter FASTA SBOL2 -o '$output' 'input.$fasta_input.ext' --namespace '$convert_type.namespace' #end if

param.name: type
param.label: Converting type
param.help: Choose the format (input/ouput) for SBOL conversion

param.name: sbol2_input
param.label: SBOL2 input
param.help: SBOL2 file in XML or RDF or NT format

param.name: sbol3_input
param.label: SBOL3 input
param.help: SBOL3 file in XML or RDF or NT format

param.name: sbol3_input
param.label: SBOL3 input
param.help: SBOL3 file in XML or RDF or NT format

param.label: Namespace URL
param.help: Namespace URL, required for conversions from GenBank. Default=https://synbiohub.org/public/igem

param.name: sbol3_input
param.label: SBOL3 input
param.help: SBOL3 file in XML or RDF or NT format

param.label: Namespace URL
param.help: Namespace URL, required for conversions from FASTA. Default=https://synbiohub.org/public/igem

param.name: sbol2_input
param.label: SBOL2 input
param.help: SBOL2 file in XML or RDF or NT format

param.label: Namespace URL
param.help: Namespace URL, required for conversions from FASTA. Default=https://synbiohub.org/public/igem

tool.help:
SBOL Converter ==============
Convert between SBOL3 and other genetic design formats.
Input ----- Required: * **INPUT_FILE**\ : SBOL2 or SBOL3 or GENBANK or FASTA input file. * **Namespace URL**\ : Namespace URL, required for conversions from GenBank or from Fasta. Default=https://synbiohub.org/public/igem"
Output ------ * **OUTPUT_FILE**\ : SBOL2 or SBOL3 or GENBANK or FASTA output file.
